miracle.translation[0].definitions[0].de: something very lucky or very good that happens which you did not expect to happen or did not think was possible
miracle.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: It’s a miracle you weren’t killed!
By some miracle, we managed to catch the plane.
The fence’s survival in these winds seems like a minor miracle.
miracle.translation[0].definitions[1].de: an action or event believed to be caused by God, which is impossible according to the ordinary laws of nature
miracle.translation[0].note_box[0].secti: The new coach has worked miracles, and the team have won their last four games.
He'll need a miracle to pass this test.
